mapper.insert: /* sql : FaqRepository.save */ INSERT INTO TB_FAQ ( FAQ_ID, BOARD_ID, FAQ_TITLE, MAIN_TEXT, CREATED_ID, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_ID, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( 'FQ'||LPAD(nextval('SEQ_FAQ')||'', 8, '0'), #{board_id}, #{faq_title}, #{main_text}, #{created_id}, now(), #{created_id}, now() )
mapper.select: /* sql : FaqRepository.findByFaqId */ SELECT A.FAQ_ID, A.BOARD_ID, A.FAQ_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS CREATED_AT, TO_CHAR(A.UPDATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS UPDATED_AT, FN_GETUSERNM(A.CREATED_ID) AS CREATED_NM, FN_GETUSERNM(A.UPDATED_ID) AS UPDATED_NM, A.CREATED_ID, A.UPDATED_ID, A.USE_YN, FN_GETCODENM('USE_YN', A.USE_YN) AS USE_YN_NM, B.BOARD_TITLE, A.MAIN_TEXT, A.VIEW_CNT FROM TB_FAQ A, TB_BOARD B WHERE A.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' and A.FAQ_ID = #{faq_id}
